org.drip.portfolioconstruction.optimizer

Class FormulationTerm

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.drip.portfolioconstruction.core.Block
      • org.drip.portfolioconstruction.optimizer.FormulationTerm
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ConstraintTerm, ObjectiveTerm

    public abstract class FormulationTerm
extends Block
    FormulationTerm holds the Core Objective/Constraint Formulation Terms. It includes the R^d To R^1 Objective and/or Constraints as well as their Category.
    Author:
    Lakshmi Krishnamurthy
